mapper.select: select c.community_id, name, profile_simg, c.email, community_content, to_char(community_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss') community_date, to_char(community_udate, 'yyyy/mm/dd hh:mi:ss') community_udate, nvl(rcount, 0) rcount from tum_community c, tum_member m, (select count(*) rcount, community_id from tum_community_reply group by community_id) r where c.email = m.email and c.community_id = r.community_id(+) and pj_id = #{pj_id} order by community_date desc
select community_id, community_content from tum_community where community_id=#{community_id}

select reply_id, c.community_id, r.email, m.name, m.profile_simg, reply_content, to_char(reply_date,'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi') reply_date from tum_community c, tum_community_reply r, tum_member m where c.community_id = r.community_id and r.email = m.email and c.community_id = #{community_id}
mapper.update: update tum_community set community_content = #{community_content}, community_udate = sysdate where community_id = #{community_id}
